event.event-date-description: If the date of the event has changed, either cancel this event and create a new, or consult the dj.
event.paid-message: The offer has been paid and confirmed.
event.quality-message: Keep in mind that quality often follows price.
event.contact-dj-message: You can always contact the DJ to discuss the price. If a DJ updates the offer, the new price will be shown here. After the event has been confirmed, the DJ's phone number and email will become visible.
event.no-offers-message:
The DJs are currently creating offers for you.
You will be notified whenever there's a new offer.

offer.empty-chat: Send a message to the DJ.
offer.refund: Full refund if event is cancelled ${ days } or more days before it starts. Otherwise ${ percentage }% is refunded.
offer.payment-failed: Something went wrong, the payment has not been made
offer.payment-info: In case of cancelation by the DJ, the full amount will be refunded. If you cancel, the amount specified by the DJ's cancelation policy will be refunded.
offer.pay-later: The DJ can be booked up to 80 days before the event, but we can notify when you can come back here and pay.
offer.price: The price the DJ has offered.
offer.fee:
The fee is calculated per offer, and helps us run the platform.
It includes VAT.
offer.terms: By clicking confirm & pay you agree to our terms and conditions, and the cancelation policy specified by the DJ.

review.rating: Click on the stars to rate.
review.description: Optionally tell us how the DJ performed.

contact.name: What is the name of the contact person?
contact.email: We only share the email with qualified DJs. Login to change email.
contact.phone: We only share the phone number with qualified DJs.
contact.profile: Organizing multiple events? If yes, you should create a profile to keep track of the events. Request an email tp create a profile associated you email.

en.cancel-event-warning: Are you sure you want to cancel the event?
en.Pay-method: When do you want to pay?
en.decline-warning: Are you sure you want to decline this DJ? If you decline, the DJ will be removed, and a new DJ will be asked to make an offer. If you are dissatisfied with the price, you can message the DJ asking for a different offer.
